card.name: PIXEL Play Credit Card
card.description: PIXEL Play is a 100% digital credit card experience that allows customization of benefits to fit lifestyle, with seamless digital onboarding, card design selection, billing cycle choice, and app-based management.
card.target_audience: Salaried and Self Employed Indian Nationals aged 21-60 years with minimum income criteria.

categories.name: Any two packs (Dining & Entertainment, Travel, Grocery, Electronics, Fashion)
categories.description: 5% Cashback on choice of any two packs, each pack comprising two merchants.
categories.terms_and_conditions: CashPoints capped at 500 per calendar month per category. Transactions less than ₹100 not eligible. Excludes fuel, wallet spends, rent, government transactions, EMI, cash advances, fees, and charges.
categories.how_to_earn: Select two packs post card approval and transact with merchants in those packs.
categories.validity: CashPoints valid for 2 years from accumulation.
categories.exclusions: Fuel spends, wallet loads, rent payments, government transactions, EMI transactions, cash advances, payment of fees and charges.

categories.name: SmartBuy Platform
categories.description: 5% Cashback on SmartBuy spends on select categories.
categories.terms_and_conditions: CashPoints capped at 500 per calendar month. Not combinable with other merchant cashbacks.
categories.how_to_earn: Make transactions through SmartBuy platform categories.

categories.name: Any one e-commerce merchant (PayZapp, Amazon, Flipkart)
categories.description: 3% Cashback on choice of any one e-commerce merchant.
categories.terms_and_conditions: CashPoints capped at 500 per calendar month. Transactions less than ₹100 not eligible. Excludes wallet loads and EMI transactions.
categories.how_to_earn: Select one e-commerce merchant post card approval and transact.
categories.exclusions: Wallet loads, rent, government transactions, EMI, cash advances, fees.

categories.name: All other spends
categories.description: 1% unlimited Cashback on all other spends.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Excludes fuel, wallet loads, rent, government transactions, EMI, cash advances, fees.
categories.how_to_earn: Use card for all other transactions.
categories.exclusions: Fuel spends, wallet loads, rent payments, government transactions, EMI transactions, cash advances, fees.

categories.name: UPI spends (PIXEL RuPay Credit Card only)
categories.description: 1% Cashback on UPI spends with PIXEL RuPay Credit Card.
categories.terms_and_conditions: CashPoints capped at 500 per calendar month. Excludes restricted merchant categories and transactions less than ₹100.
categories.how_to_earn: Use PIXEL RuPay Credit Card for UPI transactions.
categories.exclusions: Restricted categories like P2P, cash withdrawals, IPO, mutual funds, etc.

bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Joining fee of ₹500 waived on meeting spend criteria.

bonus_rates.condition: Spend ₹1,00,000 or more in preceding 12 months
bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Annual fee of ₹500 waived on meeting spend criteria.

redemption.option: Redeem PIXEL CashPoints to PayZapp Wallet
redemption.process: Redeem via Rewards Page in PIXEL Play Credit Card homepage via PayZapp app.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: CashPoints expire after 2 years. Minimum 1000 points required for redemption.

benefits.name: Fuel Surcharge Waiver
benefits.description: 1% fuel surcharge waiver at all fuel stations across India on transactions between ₹400 and ₹5,000.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use PIXEL Play Credit Card for fuel transactions.
benefits.value: Up to ₹250 waiver per statement cycle.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transaction ₹400, maximum ₹5,000 per transaction. Maximum waiver ₹250 per statement cycle.

benefits.name: Swiggy Dineout Offer
benefits.description: Flat 10% savings on PIXEL Play credit card payments via Swiggy Dineout.
benefits.how_to_avail: Pay using PIXEL Play Credit Card on Swiggy Dineout.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid till 31st December 2025. Max ₹300 per month.

benefits.name: Pay in Parts
benefits.description: Convert outstanding balance to EMIs instantly via PayZapp app with flexible tenures.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use PayZapp app to convert balance to EMI.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Gold & Jewelry transactions excluded. CashPoints reversed on EMI conversion. GST applicable on interest and processing fees.

current_offers.title: Joining Fee Waiver
current_offers.description: Get joining fee waiver by spending ₹20,000 within 90 days of issuance.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Spend ₹20,000 in first 90 days to waive ₹500 joining fee.
current_offers.eligibility: New PIXEL Play Credit Card holders.

current_offers.title: Renewal Fee Waiver
current_offers.description: Spend ₹1 lakh or more in preceding 12 months to get renewal fee waived off for next year.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Spend ₹1,00,000 or more in preceding 12 months to waive ₹500 renewal fee.
current_offers.eligibility: Existing PIXEL Play Credit Card holders.

perks.name: Contactless Payment
perks.description: Tap & Pay and Swipe to Pay enabled for fast and secure payments without OTP.
perks.how_to_use: Tap card or phone at contactless-enabled terminals.

perks.name: Card Customization
perks.description: Choose card design (POP, LIT, ICE) and billing cycle date.
perks.how_to_use: Select options during card setup in PayZapp app.
perks.terms_and_conditions: Design change allowed except when card is blocked or delinquent.

perks.name: Zero Lost Card Liability
perks.description: Zero liability on fraudulent transactions if card is reported lost immediately.
perks.how_to_use: Report lost card immediately to 24-hour call center.

partnerships.benefit: Flat 10% savings on payments via PIXEL Play Credit Card
partnerships.how_to_avail: Pay using PIXEL Play Credit Card on Swiggy Dineout.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Waived on spend of ₹20,000 in first 90 days
Waived on annual spend of ₹1,00,000 or more
